trans-unit.source: Provides a class that encapsulates theme and style sheet information for controls in a designer environment.
Page developers and control authors do not use the ThemeProvider class.

ASP.NET developer tool and designer builders use the ThemeProvider class in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> interface to apply themes and their respective control skins to controls at design time.
The ThemeProvider class encapsulates the information needed to apply a theme or style sheet theme and its control skins to the child controls of a control in a designer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> class.

The `themeDefinition` parameter passed to the ThemeProvider constructor represents the concatenation of all control skins associated with the theme but is not exposed directly by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class, as this particular parameter is passed to a <xref:System.Web.UI.DesignTimeTemplateParser> to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> and is not otherwise used.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that represents the current designer environment.
The name of the theme or style sheet theme that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> represents.
This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Theme information passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DesignTimeTemplateParser.ParseTheme%28System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
These are the raw, concatenated contents of the theme.
The names of the cascading style sheet (CSS) files that are included with the theme that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> represents.
The absolute path of the file that contains the theme and control skin information for the named theme.
Gets the hash of the theme definition passed to the constructor.
A hash code for the string passed as the theme definition to the class constructor.
Gets a set of strings that represent the names of any cascading style sheet (CSS) files associated with the current theme, if the theme is a style sheet theme.
This property is used by designer hosts to add style sheet links to CSS files when rendering HTML to a design surface.
An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of strings that identify the CSS files associated with the theme or style sheet theme.
This property might return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> object that represents the current designer environment.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that represents the current designer environment.
Retrieves a <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> instance for the specified control, which is used to apply a theme and control skin in a designer environment.
The GetSkinBuilder method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> base class to apply a theme and any control skin to a control when it is built at design time.
The control to apply a theme and control skin to.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> instance, if one is defined for the specified control type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object that contains a set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> objects for the specified <xref:System.Type>.
A <xref:System.Type> for which to retrieve any associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> objects.
An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains a list of one or more <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> objects associated with the <xref:System.Type> passed to the method.

This list is populated with <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects where the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID*> is a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key*>, and its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> is the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value*>.
Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of skin identifiers that are associated with the specified <xref:System.Type>.
The GetSkinsForControl method is used by designers to populate lists of control skin names.
Designers use the list to bind to user interface (UI) elements or to display design properties for a given control type.
A <xref:System.Type> for which to retrieve any associated skin names.
An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of skin identifiers, if control skins are defined for the specified <xref:System.Type>.
If no control skins are associated with the type, an empty <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is returned.
Gets the name of the theme or style sheet theme that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> instance represents.

The ThemeName property is set by the `name` property of the [ThemeProvider(IDesignerHost, String, String, String\[\], String)](assetId:///M:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.String)?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) constructor.
The name of the theme or style sheet theme that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> instance represents.
